doc.name: JAIDataConvert
doc.description:
An actor that converts the data in an image to a new type. This is commonly used when other actors, for instance the DCT, do not preserve the data type of the input.

The dataFormat attribute determines what type the data is being cast to. The available options are byte, double, float, int, short, and unsigned short.
doc.author: James Yeh
doc.property: The type to cast the data to. This is a string valued attribute that defaults to "byte".
